title: Practical Placeholders
text: loripsum() function probably best go-place holder text API package, provides control output far contents concerned. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Istam voluptatem perpetuam quis potest praestare sapienti? Hoc loco tenere se Triarius non potuit. Inde igitur, inquit, ordiendum est. Dempta enim aeternitate nihilo beatior Iuppiter quam Epicurus; Explanetur igitur. Sed quoniam et advesperascit et mihi ad villam revertendum est, nunc quidem hactenus; Quid vero? Tubulum fuisse, qua illum, cuius condemnatus est rogatione, P. Bork Atqui pugnantibus et contrariis studiis consiliisque semper utens nihil quieti videre, nihil tranquilli potest. Bonum incolumis acies: misera caecitas. Addidisti ad extremum etiam indoctum fuisse. Non enim, si omnia non sequebatur, idcirco non erat ortus illinc. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Illa tamen simplicia, vestra versuta. Non laboro, inquit, de nomine. Sed residamus, inquit, si placet. Minime vero istorum quidem, inquit. Traditur, inquit, ab Epicuro ratio neglegendi doloris. Bork Et ille ridens: Video, inquit, quid agas; Et quidem iure fortasse, sed tamen non gravissimum est testimonium multitudinis. quod ita callida est, ut optime possit architectari voluptates? Hoc dixerit potius Ennius: Nimium boni est, cui nihil est mali. Respondent extrema primis, media utrisque, omnia omnibus. Chrysippus autem exponens differentias animantium ait alias earum corpore excellere, alias autem animo, non nullas valere utraque re; Quonam modo? Idemne, quod iucunde? Aliter enim explicari, quod quaeritur, non potest. Aliena dixit physicis nec ea ipsa, quae tibi probarentur; Sed nunc, quod agimus; Tollenda est atque extrahenda radicitus.
code: example_loripsum <-   loripsum(     n = 3L,     length = "short",     decorate = TRUE, # adds italics, bold, etc.     link = TRUE, # adds some links     ul = TRUE, # adds an unordered list (bullets)     ol = TRUE, # adds an ordererd list (numbers)     dl = TRUE, # adds a description list (headers and contents)     bq = TRUE, # adds a blockquote     code = TRUE, # adds code samples     headers = FALSE, # adds headers - may mess with RMarkdown/Quarto!     allcaps = FALSE, # capitalises the whole output     prude = TRUE # see above note   ) Saepe ab Aristotele, a Theophrasto mirabiliter est laudata per se ipsa rerum scientia;  Sin eam, quam Hieronymus, ne fecisset idem, ut voluptatem illam Aristippi in prima commendatione poneret.

title: Practical Placeholders
text: Lorem Markdownum API similar Loripsum API terms giving lot control output, outputs place holder text using markdown formatting. Timidis parentes Charybdis subtexere medium cernis illo signis erat dat hora, Penthea perosa. Moriturae Oenopiam nubibus tempore ramis ictu. Cervix amictu vidit, pater copia noxa horruit optastis vinoque Pygmalion; comas se auctor, Haemoniam torrentem. Totidem ad ira, potentia oraque hospitiique origo vellet, Stygia vobis. Praecordia obvertit virum pectora puta acta vinoque Lucifer flentemque, nostra ora figit. Nec dant vocari, intus erat aethere tenuere tergum modo lecto. Per urbi classis limes, flamina qui nescio est ordine Messeneque vellem, ilia? Deinde Amor notam profundum gravi effugiam dedistis et et dat alii, ungues non ab! Morari hos novi virginea. Nunc heros sive ille venit cui quodque posset temptata et primusque, cura sub superos post vigilantibus. Imas incomptis subducere quod; nec et albas usque auras coniuge rarus, voluit sapienter elige. Smaragdis et perosus primum, quo indicii, luctata iussit nebulas olivae, e habet luctatur ea. Tantus qualia Flamma veri Quae superare mersit Mihi verbaque sit tanti ingens pulmone simul Exigui tibi Est labori capacibus, non suis, ille ferarum: post sensit puer; iussos. Aquas esse mortalia qui promissa: tamen utrique mutataeque soror. Dei citra tandem vinclisque avem; amor curae pugnae cecidit parentem docuique, quae cane. Sidone maris pectore, tamen dis sed patefecit condere ferre. Quod pelle querulas fit sub tympanaque inerti abscessisse, ferrum mihi nec dedantur agantur promittat Olympus colloque portabat altam. Magni abit quem, altoque famulosque retro meque relictum sanguine frigida aliter. Traderet Alcyonen lumina altissima sponte. Ignesque ea nymphe data marmora erat animos. Quattuor faciebant mutet; sine audita trabibus similis, quis Giganteis raptaque sine aestuat herbas quam, Iuppiter, Canentis. Movebere mihi conveniunt guttura concordi omni: menti per; est sunt ruit aeno inhibere. Rapere petisset inferni corpus caput et urbis positis parum res adversum quaesitique quod ut iacit abscedat decrescunt mixtos. Longa ara, et opus deprensa prae patres vivat radiis. Iuncique nox vasto, illo, meum, esse bellis, formam. Pars altera temptanti domus, non vicisse illum et illi postquam virtute cogit!
code: example_markdown <-   lipsum::markdownum(     n = 10L,     # drop various elements?     no_headers = TRUE,     no_code = FALSE,     no_inline_markup = FALSE,     no_quotes = FALSE,     no_lists = FALSE,     no_external_links = FALSE,     no_wrapping = FALSE,     # change formatting?     underline_headers = TRUE,     reference_links = TRUE,     underscore_em = TRUE,     underscore_strong = TRUE,     fenced_code_blocks = TRUE   ) var orientation_saas = webThread - sharewarePup * multimediaQuicktime; software_system.flood = wheel_ping_key; mysql += 5;

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: litipsum() function really “silly” whimsical ipsum generators; grabs excerpts public domain classic literature like Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, . Users can opt paragraph list tags, don’t expect complicated elements . admire, even moment, way dominant spirit asserted . hunting parties adventures different parts world, Quincey Morris always one arrange plan action, Arthur accustomed obey implicitly. Now, old habit seemed renewed instinctively. swift glance around room, laid plan attack, , without speaking word, gesture, placed us position. Van Helsing, Harker, just behind door, opened Professor guard whilst two stepped incomer door. Godalming behind Quincey front stood just sight ready move front window. waited suspense made seconds pass nightmare slowness. slow, careful steps came along hall; Count evidently prepared surprise–least feared . Suddenly single bound leaped room, winning way past us us raise hand stay . something panther-like movement–something unhuman, seemed sober us shock coming. first act Harker, , quick movement, threw door leading room front house. Count saw us, horrible sort snarl passed face, showing eye-teeth long pointed; evil smile quickly passed cold stare lion-like disdain. expression changed , single impulse, advanced upon . pity better organised plan attack, even moment wondered . know whether lethal weapons avail us anything. Harker evidently meant try matter, ready great Kukri knife made fierce sudden cut . blow powerful one; diabolical quickness Count’s leap back saved . second less trenchant blade shorne heart. , point just cut cloth coat, making wide gap whence bundle bank-notes stream gold fell . expression Count’s face hellish, moment feared Harker, though saw throw terrible knife aloft another stroke. Instinctively moved forward protective impulse, holding Crucifix Wafer left hand. felt mighty power fly along arm; without surprise saw monster cower back similar movement made spontaneously one us. impossible describe expression hate baffled malignity–anger hellish rage–came Count’s face. waxen hue became greenish-yellow contrast burning eyes, red scar forehead showed pallid skin like palpitating wound. next instant, sinuous dive swept Harker’s arm, ere blow fall, , grasping handful money floor, dashed across room, threw window. Amid crash glitter falling glass, tumbled flagged area . sound shivering glass hear “ting” gold, sovereigns fell flagging. ran saw spring unhurt ground. , rushing steps, crossed flagged yard, pushed open stable door. turned spoke us:–
code: example_lit <-   litipsum(n = 3L,            tag = "p", # add p tags            source = "dracula") # take from dracula

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: baconipsum() hipsteripsum() similar options identical simply (partly) replace random Latin lorem ipsum meat words hipster-y phrases, respectively. MEAT: Bacon ipsum dolor amet sirloin drumstick tongue chislic cupim filet mignon. Porchetta t-bone kielbasa pastrami capicola. Chicken tail leberkas, pastrami beef ribs buffalo short loin andouille corned beef chislic short ribs porchetta jowl t-bone. Leberkas beef ribs porchetta, burgdoggen frankfurter ribeye kielbasa. Cupim corned beef bresaola venison jowl jerky pork alcatra. HIPSTER: ’m baby seitan thundercats squid pour-JOMO pok pok copper mug. Craft beer cold-pressed scenester pitchfork narwhal echo park probably haven’t heard blue bottle cloud bread kickstarter mlkshk ugh messenger bag man bun. Bodega boys craft beer farm--table, drinking vinegar meggings vape meditation. Cronut lumbersexual deep v distillery. Lomo subway tile lyft taxidermy celiac normcore salvia aesthetic portland, gluten-free yes plz sold hell meggings kale chips.
code: example_meat <- baconipsum(n_sentences = 5L,                            type = "all-meat",                            start_with_lorem = TRUE)  example_hipster <- hipsteripsum(n_sentences = 5L,                                 type = "hipster-centric",                                 start_with_lorem = TRUE)

title: Obtain Lorem Ipsum Text From Web APIs
text: goal lipsum get easy access several “Lorem Ipsum” web APIs simply generate customisable placeholder text. R world, likely commonly used within RMarkdown/Quarto documents Shiny apps. lorem package also serves similar purpose, lipsum’s interfacing variety APIs may allow flexible placeholder outputs. example, loripsum() function gives lot control kinds features placeholder text (example, lists, links, headers, ). lipsum owes lot awesome-ipsum list, uses categorisations: Practical, placeholder generators useful “professional” settings. either generate text Latin, business-sounding text like newspaper articles. Whimsical, playful generators impersonate celebrities, list names dinosaurs, use profanity, . perhaps appropriate personal projects!

what: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
code: baconipsum(   n_paras = 5L,   n_sentences = NULL,   type = c("all-meat", "meat-and-filler"),   start_with_lorem = TRUE )

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
text: https://baconipsum.com/

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — baconipsum
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. n_sentences Integer, optional. number sentences generate. Overrides n_paras. type Character. One "-meat" meat words , "meat--filler" meat mixed random lorem ipsum words. Defaults "-meat". start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, starts first paragraph 'Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet'. Defaults TRUE.

text: n Integer, optional. number paragraphs generate. default, NULL, generates one "page" text source. tag Character, optional. One "p" "li", renders paragraphs p li tags, respectively. source Character, optional. book take placeholder text. One adventures-sherlock-holmes, dr-jekyll--mr-hyde, dracula, evelina, life--samuel-johnson, picture--dorian-gray, pride--prejudice. default, NULL, chooses one random.

what: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
text: Generates paragraphs quotes Rick Morty. Note output may contain obscenities.

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
code: loremricksum(n_paras = 2L, n_sentences = 4L)

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
text: http://loremricksum.com/

title: Randomly Generate Rick & Morty Quotes — loremricksum
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 2. n_sentences Integer. number sentences generate per paragraph. Defaults 4.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Loripsum Web API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
code: loripsum(   n = 5L,   length = "short",   decorate = FALSE,   link = FALSE,   ul = FALSE,   ol = FALSE,   dl = FALSE,   bq = FALSE,   code = FALSE,   headers = FALSE,   allcaps = FALSE,   prude = FALSE,   plaintext = FALSE )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: https://loripsum.net/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — loripsum
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. length Character. average length paragraph. Can "short", "medium", "long" "verylong". Defaults "short". decorate Logical. TRUE, bold, italic marked text. Defaults FALSE. link Logical. TRUE, adds links. Defaults FALSE. ul Logical. TRUE, adds unordered lists. Defaults FALSE. ol Logical. TRUE, adds numbered/ordered lists. Defaults FALSE. dl Logical. TRUE, adds description lists. Defaults FALSE. bq Logical. TRUE, adds blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. code Logical. TRUE, adds code samples. Defaults FALSE. headers Logical. TRUE, adds headers. Defaults FALSE. allcaps Logical. TRUE, uses CAPS. Defaults FALSE. prude Logical. TRUE, removes Latin words construed offensive English, like 'sex' 'homo'. Defaults FALSE. plaintext Logical. TRUE, returns plain text without HTML tags. Defaults FALSE.

what: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: Generates customisable placeholder text using Lorem Markdownum API, formatted markdown.

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
code: markdownum(   n = 5L,   no_headers = FALSE,   no_code = FALSE,   no_inline_markup = FALSE,   no_quotes = FALSE,   no_lists = FALSE,   no_external_links = FALSE,   no_wrapping = FALSE,   underline_headers = FALSE,   reference_links = FALSE,   underscore_em = FALSE,   underscore_strong = FALSE,   fenced_code_blocks = FALSE )

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: https://jaspervdj./lorem-markdownum/

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — markdownum
text: n Integer. number "blocks" generate. Defaults 5. no_headers Logical. TRUE, removes headers. Defaults FALSE. no_code Logical. TRUE, removes code snippets. Defaults FALSE. no_inline_markup Logical. TRUE, removes inline markup. Defaults FALSE. no_quotes Logical. TRUE, removes blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. no_lists Logical. TRUE, removes lists. Defaults FALSE. no_external_links Logical. TRUE, replaces external links internal links. Defaults FALSE. no_wrapping Logical. TRUE, prevents text wrapping. Defaults FALSE. underline_headers Logical. TRUE, headers underlined. Defaults FALSE. reference_links Logical. TRUE, uses reference-style links. Defaults FALSE. underscore_em Logical. TRUE, styles  using underscores. Defaults FALSE. underscore_strong Logical. TRUE, styles  using double underscores. Defaults FALSE. fenced_code_blocks Logical. TRUE, fences code blocks back-ticks. Defaults FALSE.
